About.title: About Us
About.description: We are a transportation services company offering ride-hailing through a WhatsApp Business group. Customers can request a ride at any time, and the nearest available driver responds immediately. We operate using a fleet of organized private cars driven by professional drivers. We also provide car leasing services and car sales assistance.

rideHailing.title: Ride-Hailing via WhatsApp
rideHailing.description: We manage a dedicated WhatsApp Business group for instant ride requests.
points: Customers send a request in the group

leasing.description: We offer a full car leasing and selling service for vehicle owners:
points: Owners can list their cars for rent or sale
We handle marketing, communication, and coordination
Full management of the leasing and handover process

rideHailing.title: Ride-Hailing via WhatsApp
rideHailing.description: Experience the convenience of requesting a ride directly through WhatsApp. No apps to download, just a simple message to our dedicated group.
rideHailing.heroImageAlt: Professional driver opening car door for passenger

howItWorks.title: How It Works
steps: Join our exclusive WhatsApp Business group.
Send your current location and destination.
The nearest available driver will accept your request instantly.
Enjoy a safe and comfortable ride to your destination.

benefits.title: Why Ride with 3a?
items: Lost & Found assistance via the group admin.

leasing.title: Car Leasing & Sales
leasing.description: We help car owners monetize their vehicles through our leasing program. Whether you want to rent out your car or sell it, we handle everything from marketing to handover.
leasing.heroImageAlt: Car keys being handed over in a showroom

forOwners.title: For Car Owners
forOwners.content: Turn your idle vehicle into a passive income stream. We vet all renters, handle the paperwork, and ensure your car is returned in the same condition.

forRenters.title: For Renters
forRenters.content: Choose from a wide variety of well-maintained vehicles for daily, weekly, or monthly rental. Competitive rates and flexible terms.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.content: 3a Transportation is a leading provider of innovative transportation solutions. We are dedicated to simplifying the way people move, offering a range of services from ride-hailing to vehicle leasing. Our mission is to provide safe, reliable, and accessible transportation for everyone.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.content: Get in touch with us for any inquiries. We are here to help you with all your transportation needs.

VisionMissionPage.title: Our Vision & Mission
VisionMissionPage.visionContent: To be the most trusted and efficient transportation partner in the region, known for our commitment to quality, safety, and customer satisfaction.
VisionMissionPage.missionContent: To provide safe, reliable, and accessible transportation services that meet the diverse needs of our clients, while fostering a culture of excellence and innovation.
